name: Interface ForInLoopTree
text:
A tree node for for..in statement

 For example:
 
   for ( variable in expression )
       statement
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface ForInLoopTree
extends LoopTree

methods.description: The for..in left hand side expression.
The object or array being whose properties are iterated.
The statement contained in this for..in statement.
Returns if this is a for..each..in statement or not.
